author: wadalliance
title: wadaDAO
description: DAO tools on Cardano are early.  Customizable tooling for treasury management, voting, organizing, and multilateral agreements are lacking.
solution: Fuse known organizational standards into DAO models. Design distributed treasury system. Confirm quadratic voting and other voting models.
experience:
Wada: Experienced project managers and network of developers
Photrek: Complex system decision making modeling and research
